# shinycsshelper

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of shinycssavoider is to help you explore layout and design choices for your Shiny App before writing a .css file. Just click around the app until you've found a design you like, then download the .css file and put it in the www/ folder of your Shiny App.
